name: help
description: Return the commands of the bot

name: invite
description: Return a bot invitation link and a GitHub one

name: google
description: Return a google link of your research

name: ping
description: Return the ping of the bot in milliseconde

name: dice
description: Return a number between 0 and the max given

name: fly
description: The mentioned person will fly in all channel of the server

name: purge
description: Delete a numbers of message in this channel

name: broadcast
description: Broadcast in all text channels the message given

name: flip
description: Flip a coin and return heads or tails
